alert.note: Alert for Menard (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 10:31PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Menard County through 1130 PM CDT... At 1031 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Camp Sol Mayer, or 10 miles north of Fort Mckavett, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Menard, Camp Sol Mayer, The Intersection Of Us- 83 And Ranch Road 1773 and The Intersection Of Us-83 And Highway 29. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
